biotools.summary:
a tool to predict the impact of genetic variants on miRNAs.

miRVaS is a program designed to predict the impact of genetic variants on miRNAs.

Upload variant file (tab separated or vcf).

or paste data in the field below (complete including header and with tabs).

Cammaerts, S., Strazisar, M., Dierckx, J., Del Favero, J., De Rijk, P. (2015) miRVaS: a tool to predict the impact of genetic variants on miRNAs. Nucl. Acids Res., 10.1093/nar/gkv921.
